reviews.review_msg: doesnt have the ability to teach

He's a good prof;teachers in a good pace for non-stats students to understand the material well. If you want to do well in this class,make use of the stats workshop with the assignments as the quizzes that follow are almost identical. Pretty chilled guy,open to debating your mark if the TA got it wrong, and yes, all the girls appreciated his looks!

Liangliang is a very nice prof, she is a bit hard to understand at first, but I think people have to remember, English is her second language. The biggest problem for me is the fact that she reads of her slides instead of showing how to do calculate the problems.
